game.name: CrashMetal - Cyberpunk
game.genres: Action, Casual, Indie, Massively Multiplayer, Racing, Simulation, Sports
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: CrashMetal - Cyberpunk The Hokuta City streets await your engine rev. Can you beat everyone in this race for first place? Upgrade your car, take care of its appearance and defeat everyone on the streets of the Hokuta City.
